T02D2573:34b-1: a'arya [?] manydzu shr'i na' ma sam g'i ti tsakshu bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D2573:34b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2573:34b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2573:34b-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dga' nas //
T02D2573:34b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i skam sar byon //
T02D2573:34b-7: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2573:34b-9: gzhan la phan pa'i blo mchog gis //
T02D2573:34b-10: dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs brnyan rnams //
T02D2573:34b-11: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2573:34b-12: bzang zhing dge ba bshad par bya //
T02D2573:34b-13: de nas rdo rje slob dpon blo gros dang ldan
T02D2573:34b-14: pas gtsug lag khang ngam sku gzugs la sogs pa'i
T02D2573:34b-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2573:34b-16: gzugs brnyan nam glegs bam dang mchod rten la sogs
T02D2573:34b-17: pa rab tu gnas par bya bar 'dod pas /
T02D2573:34b-18: ri bo'am nags tshal la sogs pa'i gnas su bsnyen pa rgyas par byas la /
T02D2573:34b-19: 'bad pa thams cad kyis bsgom bzlas bya'o //
T02D2573:34b-20: de la 'dir gang rab tu gnas pa bya bar 'dod pa de rnams sta gon du bya ste /
T02D2573:34b-21: bdag tu gzung ba'i bgegs thams cad bskrad do //
T02D2573:34b-22: gu gul gyis bdug cing bgegs bskrad pa'i cha ga shas cher bya'o //
T02D2573:34b-23: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'di skad ces snyan gsan dbab par bya ste /
T02D2573:34b-24: 'ji ltar dga' ldan gnas mchog na //
T02D2573:34b-25: bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa de //
T02D2573:34b-26: sgyu 'phrul lha mo'i lhums zhugs ltar //
T02D2573:34b-27: deng nub bde gshegs thams cad ni //
T02D2573:34b-28: de zhin gzugs brnyan 'di la ni //
T02D2573:34b-29: 'jug par shin tu mdzad du gsol //
T02D2573:34b-30: 'di la sangs rgyas rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D2573:34b-31: byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //
T02D2573:34b-32: yon bdag rnams kyi don bya'i phyir //
T02D2573:34b-33: bdag gis sbyor ba 'di bgyis na //
T02D2573:34b-34: ci 'byor ba yi mchod pa rnams //
T02D2573:34b-35: me tog la sogs bzhes su gsol //
T02D2573:34b-36: bdag dang yon bdag bcas pa la //
T02D2573:34b-37: thugs brtse bar ni dgongs bcas na //
T02D2573:35a-0: @35a * // kun gyis 'di deng byin rlob cing //
T02D2573:35a-1: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs //
T02D2573:35a-3: sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa gang byed pa de gshin rje gshed kyis bsrung zhing /
T02D2573:35a-4: a'a: h'um aom hr'i: aa zhes bya bas rgyas btab la gzhag go //
T02D2573:35a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems
T02D2573:35a-6: dpa'i dkyil 'khor rigs thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya
T02D2573:35a-7: ba bris la / der bum pa thams cad bcug
T02D2573:35a-8: la dkyil 'khor de'i byang ngos su khrus kyi khang
T02D2573:35a-9: pa shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba /
T02D2573:35a-10: gser gyi ka ba bzhi dang mu tig gi chun 'phyang 'phyang ba //
T02D2573:35a-11: dri zhim po tsandan la sogs pa srog chags las ma byung ba'i dris chag chag btab la /
T02D2573:35a-12: rin po ches sbras shing gcal du bkram pa byas la /
T02D2573:35a-13: khrus kyi khang pa gang yin pa de nyid rab
T02D2573:35a-14: tu gnas par 'dod pa'i lha rnams gang yin pa
T02D2573:35a-15: spyan drangs la tshul dang mthun par gzhag la /
T02D2573:35a-16: sku khrus gsol ba ni bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2573:35a-17: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas khrus byas te /
T02D2573:35a-18: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2573:35a-19: lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar //
T02D2573:35a-20: de bzhin bdag gis lha yi chu //
T02D2573:35a-21: dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35a-22: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D2573:35a-23: lugs ma yin na dngos su khrus bya /
T02D2573:35a-24: de las gzhan pa gang yin yang me long gi ngos la sran phye dang /
T02D2573:35a-32: me tog dang bcas te ku sha'i pir gyis bkru bar bya'o //
T02D2573:35a-34: ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas //
T02D2573:35a-35: lha mdzes lhums zhugs bltams la khrus gsol ltar /
T02D2573:35a-36: sku gdung ring bsrel dri ma med par byas //
T02D2573:35a-37: sprul sku yid 'ong rnams la sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35a-38: phyogs bcu bdud rtsi dam pa'i char 'bebs pa //
T02D2573:35a-39: rgyal ba dam chos rnams la sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu rn'a di pa kro dha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:35a-42: de nas sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i bum pa lha'i
T02D2573:35a-43: chus bkang la slob dpon gyis bzung nas me long
T02D2573:35a-44: la dri'i thig le lnga dang /
T02D2573:35a-45: me tog gi tshom pu lnga dang bcas pa la
T02D2573:35b-0: 'di skad brjod @35b de sku khrus gsol ba ni
T02D2573:35b-1: / gzugs kyi phung po rnam dag pa //
T02D2573:35b-2: gti mug dri ma sbyong byed pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis //
T02D2573:35b-4: dpal ldan sku yi sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35b-5: tshor ba'i phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-6: nga rgyal dri ma sbyong byed pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis //
T02D2573:35b-8: dpal ldan yon tan sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35b-9: 'du shes phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-10: 'dod chags dri ma sbyong byed pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-11: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2573:35b-12: dpal ldan gsung gi sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35b-13: 'du byed phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-14: phrag dog dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-15: bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis //
T02D2573:35b-16: dpal ldan phrin las sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35b-17: rnam shes phung po rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-18: zhe sdang dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i //
T02D2573:35b-19: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2573:35b-20: dpal ldan thugs kyi sku khrus gsol //
T02D2573:35b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta buddha badzra ratna padma
T02D2573:35b-22: karmma aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri
T02D2573:35b-23: ye h'um / de'i rjes la ras gtsang ma dris bskus pas sku phyis te /
T02D2573:35b-24: rgyal ba'i sku ni mkha' la zla bzhin gsal //
T02D2573:35b-25: sangs rgyas sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang //
T02D2573:35b-26: 'gro ba'i bag chags ma lus bsal bya'i phyir //
T02D2573:35b-27: kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis sku phyis pas //
T02D2573:35b-28: sems can bag chags ma lus byang gyur cig //
T02D2573:35b-29: ni rm'a k'a ya shuddho& ham zhes pas sku phyis la /
T02D2573:35b-30: rigs dang mthun pa'i na bza' rnams kyang dbul zhing bkra shis kyang brjod do //
T02D2573:35b-31: aom 'di pa na pa ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:35b-35: aom a'a bh'a ra ni pi bh'u sh' ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:35b-36: zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyan dbul te /
T02D2573:35b-37: 'gro kun yun du bskyang ba'i phyir //
T02D2573:35b-38: lha yin bza' dam pa ni //
T02D2573:35b-39: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la dbul //
T02D2573:35b-40: ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D2573:35b-42: byang chub yan lag rgyan gyur cing //
T02D2573:35b-43: 'gro bas bsod nams thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2573:35b-44: bde gshegs sras la rgyan mchog dbul //
T02D2573:35b-45: ce bde bar ni bzhes su gsol //
T02D2573:35b-47: ; de nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sgrub ste /
T02D2573:35b-48: bdag nyid kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rdzogs pa'i
T02D2573:35b-49: rjes la rab gnas kyi lha shin tu gsal bar
T02D2573:35b-50: byas te / ye shes kyi 'khor lo bar snang la bsdus te /
T02D2573:36a-0: spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstims te dbang @36a * //
T02D2573:36a-2: mchod pa shin tu rgyas par dbul ba ni dngos su 'byor ba'i mchod pa lnga dang /
T02D2573:36a-3: yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2573:36a-4: gzhan yang sgra dang rol mo'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2573:36a-5: de ltar legs par mchod cing sbyin sreg gi las kyang brtsam par bya'o //
T02D2573:36a-6: de'i rjes la gtor ma rgya chen po yang bshams la gzhag go //
T02D2573:36a-7: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' bcug la nad bar nyi ma shar kar spyan dbye bar bya ste /
T02D2573:36a-8: bdag nyid rnam snang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2573:36a-9: gnas pas des gser las byas pa'i thur ma thogs
T02D2573:36a-10: la / rgyal ba mkha' la byon pa'i thugs rje can //
T02D2573:36a-11: sangs rgyas spyan la 'gag pa mi mda' yang //
T02D2573:36a-12: sems can rnams kyi bag chags sbyang slad du //
T02D2573:36a-13: bder gshegs rnams kyi spyan ni dbye bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36a-14: sems can ldongs pa thams cad bsal gyur cig /
T02D2573:36a-15: aom nirm'a k'a ya badzra tsakshu pra be sha bi
T02D2573:36a-17: gser gyi snyan brud pa thogs la //
T02D2573:36a-18: rgyal ba'i snyan la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D2573:36a-19: sems can thos pas phongs gyur te //
T02D2573:36a-20: rgyal ba chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar //
T02D2573:36a-21: de bzhin sems can kun don phyir //
T02D2573:36a-22: bde gshegs snyan ni dbye bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36a-23: chos kyi sgra rnams thos gyur cig / aom nirm'a
T02D2573:36a-24: k'a ya ri bya karna ye sva bh'a ba shuddho
T02D2573:36a-25: & ham / gser gyi tsher gzungs thogs la //
T02D2573:36a-26: rgyal ba'i shangs la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang //
T02D2573:36a-27: 'gro ba'i sems can don gyi phyir //
T02D2573:36a-28: zag bcas phung po'i dri ma spangs nas ni //
T02D2573:36a-29: rnam par dag pa dri med skyed byed ltar //
T02D2573:36a-30: rgyal ba'i shangs ni bdag gis dbye bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36a-31: zag med dri med dam pa tshor gyur cig /
T02D2573:36a-32: aom nirm'a k'a ya dha bya n'a sa ye sva
T02D2573:36a-33: h'a // rin po che'i thur ma thogs la //
T02D2573:36a-34: 'gro ba chos kyis phongs pa la //
T02D2573:36a-35: dam chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2573:36a-36: chos kyi ro ldan dag pa yis //
T02D2573:36a-37: 'gro ba thams cad tshim mdzad ltar //
T02D2573:36a-38: ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas rnams //
T02D2573:36a-39: dbul phyir zhal ni dbye bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36a-40: aom nirm'a k'a ya aid ni bya mu kha ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36a-41: de nas rab byung gi gzugs yin na spu gri thogs la /
T02D2573:36a-42: ji ltar rang byung mchod rten du //
T02D2573:36b-0: @36b ston pas khyim pa'i rtags spangs ltar //
T02D2573:36b-1: 'gro ba sems can don gyi phyir //
T02D2573:36b-2: khyim pa'i rtags rnams spang bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36b-3: snam sbyar dang bla gos gsol nas //
T02D2573:36b-4: ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis //
T02D2573:36b-5: rgyal ba'i sku lan bza' gsol ba ltar //
T02D2573:36b-6: de bzhin 'gro ba rnams la sman pa'i phyir //
T02D2573:36b-7: ngo tsha khrel yod gos mchog gsol bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36b-8: aom nirm'a k'a ya to phyol tra pra na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36b-9: zhes brjod par bya zhing dbul lo //
T02D2573:36b-10: aom au pa su k'a sa pa ri sr'a ba na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36b-11: zhes pas chu tshags dang lhung bzed la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D2573:36b-12: de nas thugs kar rdo rje dir bsgos pa bzung la /
T02D2573:36b-13: mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa bskyed de /
T02D2573:36b-14: dung dang dpal be'u g-yung drung 'khyil pa 'di //
T02D2573:36b-15: bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis rnam brgyan pa //
T02D2573:36b-16: rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par rgyal gyur cig /
T02D2573:36b-17: aom nirm'a k'a ya trim shad ma h'a pu ru
T02D2573:36b-18: sha laksha na sho dha aa nu byanydza ye sv'a
T02D2573:36b-19: h'a / bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan de 'khor
T02D2573:36b-20: los sgyur ba'i cha byad yin na de ltar ma
T02D2573:36b-21: h'a / yin te / dung dang so mangs dang ral gri la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D2573:36b-22: dpal be'u la sogs pas brgyan pa ni shes par bya'o //
T02D2573:36b-23: glegs bam la rab tu gnas par byed pa yin na //
T02D2573:36b-24: rdo rje chos kyi ngo bo sangs rgyas snang ba
T02D2573:36b-25: mtha' yas nges par aa las bskyed la ye shes
T02D2573:36b-26: sems dpa' bcug ste dbang bskur rgyas btab nas glegs
T02D2573:36b-27: bam du bya'o // de la na bza' dbul ba ni //
T02D2573:36b-28: byang chub yan lag rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2573:36b-29: dam chos gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2573:36b-30: na bza' dri ma med pa 'di //
T02D2573:36b-31: dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bgyi //
T02D2573:36b-32: aom dharma dhe bhya pra ta sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36b-34: de'i rjes la rdo rje thag pa gang yin pa des bsdams te /
T02D2573:36b-35: mtshal lam sin dhu ra'i rgya rim pa bdun du btab la /
T02D2573:36b-36: aom badzra mu dra bandha ya aa dhi ti shtha sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36b-38: rab tu gnas pa de mchod rten yin na bde
T02D2573:36b-39: bar gshegs pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su rdzogs par
T02D2573:36b-40: byas la ye shes sems dpa' yang nges par bcug
T02D2573:36b-41: nas dbang bskur rgyas btab nas mchod de bkra shis
T02D2573:36b-42: brjod la de rnams las byung ba'i byang chub sems
T02D2573:36b-43: dpa' chen po'i mchod rten du dmigs la /
T02D2573:36b-44: aom aa ra dze bi ra dze sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:36b-45: zhes pas sa dkar byug / aom aar ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-0: @37a * // aom tsakra bta na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-2: aom tstsh'a tra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-4: aom ku bi ra dh'a dza ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-6: aom p'a ta ka ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-8: aom pa tu d'a ma lam pa ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-10: aom pushpa m'a la ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-11: zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba gdags so //
T02D2573:37a-12: byang chub sems dpa' yin na khab dang snyung bu dang so mngas dbul /
T02D2573:37a-13: 'gro ba sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2573:37a-14: rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la bslab bya zhes //
T02D2573:37a-15: ji ltar thugs dam rgya che bzhes pa bzhin //
T02D2573:37a-16: mkho ba'i yo byad rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi //
T02D2573:37a-17: aom au pa su ka la sa pa ni sk'a ra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2573:37a-18: de nas thams cad thun mong du yang mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod la /
T02D2573:37a-19: gdugs gser gyi yu ba can la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2573:37a-20: 'byor pa dang ldan na sbyin sreg kyang rgyas par bya'o //
T02D2573:37a-21: ma 'byor na ts'a ru dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2573:37a-22: de nas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2573:37a-23: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras //
T02D2573:37a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun //
T02D2573:37a-26: gang dag cho ga ma tshang ba //
T02D2573:37a-27: de dag bzod par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2573:37a-28: kun du zhi dang rgyas pa yi //
T02D2573:37a-29: yon bdag ched la rab mdzad nas //
T02D2573:37a-30: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2573:37a-31: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2573:37a-32: sa dang chu dang me rlung gis //
T02D2573:37a-33: ji srid bskal pa 'jig bar ru //
T02D2573:37a-34: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gzugs la //
T02D2573:37a-35: de srid bcom ldan bsrung bar mdzod //
T02D2573:37a-36: thugs bzang yid las byung ba yi //
T02D2573:37a-37: slob dpon slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2573:37a-38: bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas //
T02D2573:37a-39: rab gnas de bas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2573:37a-41: de nas dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bcug nas
T02D2573:37a-42: rab gnas kyi ye shes sems dpa' brtan par bzhugs
T02D2573:37a-44: slob dpon dang yon bdag gnyis kas gdan khri la 'jus la me tog gi phreng ba dbul te /
T02D2573:37a-45: de srid me dang chu dang ni //
T02D2573:37a-46: rlung gi bskal pas 'jig par du //
T02D2573:37a-47: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2573:37b-0: bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par @37b mdzod //
T02D2573:37b-2: phyag na rdo rje la mchod pa dbul zhing //
T02D2573:37b-3: sprul sku bsrung bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2573:37b-5: de nas chos skyong gis srung ma'am phyogs skyong ngam /
T02D2573:37b-7: yang na gang yang rung ba la gtor ma rgya chen po dbul zhing //
T02D2573:37b-8: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2573:37b-9: sku gzugs bsrung ba'i las bcol bar bya'o //
T02D2573:37b-10: 'gro ba sems can don slad du //
T02D2573:37b-11: bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs bgyid par //
T02D2573:37b-12: bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2573:37b-13: sprul sku gzugs brnyan mthong bar mdzod //
T02D2573:37b-15: gzhan yang yul phyogs de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin
T02D2573:37b-16: pho mo la yang gtor ma btang la ched cher
T02D2573:37b-17: gtad do // gnas brtan dang khyim pa'i gtso bo
T02D2573:37b-18: rnams la yang snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sprul pa'i
T02D2573:37b-20: khyod kyis ma nyams par rungs shig ces brjod la /
T02D2573:37b-21: sku'am glegs bam mam mchod rten gang yin pa de
T02D2573:37b-22: na bza' gsol te 'gro ba rnams la bstan to
T02D2573:37b-23: // mthong ba tsam gyis bskal pa dpag tu med
T02D2573:37b-24: pa'i sgrib pa ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D2573:37b-25: // // yon bdag gang yin pa des glu gar
T02D2573:37b-26: bya zhing bkra shis brjod la sngags kyis btab pa'i
T02D2573:37b-27: zhal zas lhag ma rnams la longs spyod do //
T02D2573:37b-28: rab gnas dman pa mi shis phyir //
T02D2573:37b-29: rab gnas bzang po 'di byas pas //
T02D2573:37b-30: byas pa gang des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2573:37b-31: mthong ba tsam gyis sdig byang nas //
T02D2573:37b-32: sprul pa'i sku yi zhal mthong shog /'phags pa 'jam
T02D2573:37b-33: dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rab tu
T02D2573:37b-34: gnas pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D2573:37b-35: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2573:37b-36: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang //
